Package com.natwest.opendata.util

Class RestTemplateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.natwest.opendata.util.RestTemplateUtils
  • public class RestTemplateUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    A Utility class which contains generic methods for getting the response for various Open Data service endpoint

    • Method Detail

      • getResponse

        public static <T> T getResponse​(org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate restTemplate,
                                java.lang.String url,
                                java.lang.Class<T> responseType)
                         throws OpenDataSDKException
        A static method which return the response based on the service endpoint and response type.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        restTemplate - RestTemplate object used for getting service response
        url - End point of the URL
        responseType - Response mapped model classes like ATM, Branches
        Returns:
        A generic Response based on service endpoint called
        Throws:
        OpenDataSDKException
